content: a fun hat with a simple mosaic pattern that looks harder than it really is choose subtle or wild colors - it s up to you you will need two colors of the same weight yarn in dk yarn you will need up to 150 yards of the main color and up to 100 of the contrast color the pattern is worked in repeats of 12 stitches and includes instructions on making it bigger or smaller by changing the number of repeats so you can also use different weights of yarn if you want i hope you enjoy it
